name: Monster High: 13 Wishes
description:
Heavily based on the special of the same name, players explore a magic lamp to collect special items, free the ghouls, and use their combined powers to save the rest of Monster High from the clutches of an evil genie.

Levels combine free-roaming exploration with jumping, rudimentary fighting against the occasional enemy or boss, and solving puzzles using each character's special ability or Freaky Flaw. Players can switch among characters on the fly once they've been unlocked. A second player can grab a Wii Remote and join in by helping to defeat enemies and collect Coins. A hand-held version also is available on DS and 3DS.
